# banner_hahahellooo


# **pyfiglet**

```
    __          __          __         ____
   / /_  ____ _/ /_  ____ _/ /_  ___  / / /___  ____  ____
  / __ \/ __ `/ __ \/ __ `/ __ \/ _ \/ / / __ \/ __ \/ __ \

```

## **Install**
```
$ pip install banner_hahahellooo
```
## **Usage**

# type:
```
$ show-banner
```
## **Reference**

https://github.com/pwaller/pyfiglet
